client.title: Chat GPT, Your AI Friend in Content Marketing? For Lawyers, It Depends.
description: Want a helping hand with your legal marketing efforts? ChatGPT may be the solution! Check out our recent article published in the ABA's Law Practice Today magazine to learn more about the pros and cons of ChatGPT and AI content creation for legal marketing.

jld.title: Add Your Social Media Links to Your GBP
description: Want to know how to add social media links to your Google Business Profile? The answer is not straightforward. Because Google doesn't have a field for manually entering these links, you must force Google to connect the dots on its own.
Check out this video to learn how. And if you're a Justia website client, don't worry! We already handle the website steps for you.
